summary: I WAS EXITING THE FREEWAY GOING 70 MPH IN RUSH HOUR AND WHEN I WENT TO SLOW DOWN THE CAR JUST STALLED AND LOCKED UP THE STEERING AND EVERYTHING, WHICH CAUSED TO HIT MY ARM PRETTY HARD AND I HAD TO AVOID BEING HIT I HAD TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP IN THE MIDDLE OF THE OFF RAMP AND PUT IN PARK TO RESTART THE VEHICLE AND DRIVE AWAY IT HAS BEEN DOING MORE FREQUENTLY. I WAS HIT ALMOST 5 TIMES. I HAVE CALLED HYUNDAI BECAUSE I FEEL THIS WAS PART OF THE RECALL THEY SAID IT IS CLOSED I NEVER RCVD A LETTER AND I DON'T FEEL SAFE ESPECIALLY IF I HAVE MY SON IN THE CAR. I BASICALLY ENDED UP HITTING THE SHOULDER AND ROAD SIDE CONES PRETTY HARD
